entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
